changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.relationship_network AS SELECT net.id, p.name AS parent, net.is_transitive AS isTransitive, c.name AS child, net.notes, net.inferred, res.name AS research, u.name AS updated_by, net.update_date FROM ruleform.relationship_network net JOIN ruleform.relationship p ON net.parent = p.id JOIN ruleform.relationship c ON net.child = c.id JOIN ruleform.resource u ON net.updated_by = u.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON net.research = res.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.relationship_network OWNER TO core;
